languages.text: "Далеко не все преступники заслуживают привилегию искупления".

traits.locale_text: "Далеко не все преступники заслуживают привилегию искупления".

languages.text: "Not all criminals deserve the privilege of redemption. Far from it."
languages.original_text: "Далеко не все преступники заслуживают привилегию искупления".

traits.locale_text: "Far from all criminals deserve the privilege of redemption."
"Far from all criminals deserve the privilege of redemption."
"Not all criminals deserve the privilege of redemption. Far from it."
"Not all criminals deserve the privilege of redemption. Far from it."
"Not all criminals deserve the privilege of redemption. Far from it."
"Not all criminals deserve the privilege of redemption. Far from it."

languages.text: 「すべての罪人が、贖罪という特権に値するわけではない。むしろ、そんな者はごくわずかだ」
languages.original_text: "Not all criminals deserve the privilege of redemption. Far from it."

traits.locale_text: 「すべての罪人が、贖罪という特権に値するわけではない。むしろ、そんな者はごくわずかだ」

languages.text: "Nicht alle Verbrecher verdienen das Privileg der Erlösung. Bei weitem nicht."
languages.original_text: "Not all criminals deserve the privilege of redemption. Far from it."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht alle Verbrecher verdienen das Privileg der Erlösung. Bei weitem nicht."

languages.text: « La rédemption est un privilège que les criminels ne méritent pas forcément. Loin de là. »
languages.original_text: "Not all criminals deserve the privilege of redemption. Far from it."

traits.locale_text: « La rédemption est un privilège que les criminels ne méritent pas forcément. Loin de là. »

languages.text: «No todos los criminales merecen el privilegio de la redención. Ni mucho menos».
languages.original_text: "Not all criminals deserve the privilege of redemption. Far from it."

traits.locale_text: «No todos los criminales merecen el privilegio de la redención. Ni mucho menos».

languages.text: “并非所有罪人都有赎罪的权利，远非如此。”
languages.original_text: "Not all criminals deserve the privilege of redemption. Far from it."

traits.locale_text: “并非所有罪人都有赎罪的权利，远非如此。”

languages.text: "Her suçlu, kurtuluşu hak etmez. Hele bazıları asla."
languages.original_text: "Not all criminals deserve the privilege of redemption. Far from it."

traits.locale_text: "Her suçlu kurtuluşu hak etmiyor. Hele bazıları asla."

languages.original_text: "Not all criminals deserve the privilege of redemption. Far from it."
